name: Sticky Man Zombie Fight Arena
description:
Zombie apocalypse is almost here and only you and your sticky man army could stop this horrifying war! Become the commander of the largest sticky man army ever playing our new Sticky Man Zombie Fight Arena game and show them all who’s the boss here! Defeat these walking dead creatures, try not to lose your units and have a real fun!

Cruel zombies are everywhere! What should we do next?! Create the sticky man army, of course! Become a commander of the large sticky man army, which aim is nothing but the end of zombie apocalypse! Mind that there’re a lot of zombie types with their own characteristics and weapons, so hurry up and be really careful!

Earn points for successfully defeated zombies and power your sticky man army up with new units, which can easily exterminate this incoming zombie waves! Unlock new interesting battle locations and weapons to variate your game, check different difficulty levels and have fun! Download this new Sticky Man Zombie Fight Arena game and have fun!

Become the best sticky man army commander ever; otherwise your warriors will turn into the zombies too! They spit, they shoot, they kick and they bite – they do everything possible to exterminate all sticky men!

Sticky Man Zombie Fight Arena features:
• Join this awesome epic battle between cool sticky man soldiers and terrible zombies
• Check several difficulty levels for really experienced commanders
• Use great variety of interesting weapons, dangerous locations and brave units
• Enjoy really amazing surroundings made in 3D

These horrifying creatures invade the whole world, and the only way to defeat them is to shot their heads! It’s your turn, commandos – just create your own sticky man army and show them all who’s the boss here! Make really great placement of your sticky man troops and remember: even the smallest unit costs a lot! Play Sticky Man Zombie Fight Arena and have fun!
